content: Capsules filled with medicine are a popular delivery method. However, they can have an unpleasant aftertaste. Flavored capsules are an alternative that can make taking medication more palatable.
Variety of flavors, easy to swallow, portable, customizable dosage, can be made with natural ingredients
Gummy medicines are chewable, chewy candies that contain medicine. Gummies are a popular alternative to traditional pills and liquids.
Chewable, enjoyable flavor, customizable dosage, can be made with natural ingredients, easy to swallow
Medicated lollipops are sweetened hard candies that have medicine added to them. They are ideal for people who have difficulty swallowing large pills or liquids.
Enjoyable flavor, customizable dosage, easy to swallow, discreet, can be made with natural ingredients
Medicated beverages are liquids that have medicine added to them. They have gained popularity in recent years as an alternative to pills. Common examples include teas, coffees, and juices.
Enjoyable taste, customizable dosage, easy to swallow, can be taken hot or cold, variety of beverage options available

pain_point_description: individuals sometimes dislike the format in which medication is provided such as taste, texture, or size. offering alternative forms of medication delivery such as chewable tablets, capsules, or liquid options, can provide individuals with a better experience and create a profitable market
